issues.description: The problem specification and UML diagram define numberOfInscribedStudents as type int, but in the solution the Lecture class declares numberOfInscribedStudents as long (including constructor parameter, field, getter, and setter). This mismatch will prevent the solution from compiling as given and confuses students about the intended type.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of numberOfInscribedStudents from long to int in the Lecture class (field declaration, constructor parameter, getter return type, and setter parameter) so it matches the UML specification.
